flavorText: As insubstantial as fear, and as dangerous.

foreignData.flavorText: So wenig greifbar wie Furcht und genauso gefährlich.
foreignData.name: Phantombestie
foreignData.text: Wenn die Phantombestie das Ziel eines Zauberspruchs oder einer Fähigkeit wird, opfere sie.

foreignData.flavorText: Etéreo como el miedo, e igual de peligroso.
foreignData.name: Bestia fantasmal
foreignData.text: Cuando la Bestia fantasmal sea objetivo de un hechizo o habilidad, sacrifícala.

foreignData.flavorText: Tout aussi immatérielle que la peur, et tout aussi dangereuse.
foreignData.name: Bête fantomatique
foreignData.text: Quand la Bête fantomatique devient la cible d'un sort ou d'une capacité, sacrifiez-la.

foreignData.flavorText: Incorporea come la paura e altrettanto pericolosa.
foreignData.name: Bestia Fantasma
foreignData.text: Quando la Bestia Fantasma diventa bersaglio di una magia o abilità, sacrificala.

foreignData.flavorText: 実態の無さは恐怖に似ている。そして危険なところも。
foreignData.name: 幻影の獣
foreignData.text: 幻影の獣が呪文や能力の対象になったとき、それを生け贄に捧げる。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — イリュージョン・ビースト

foreignData.flavorText: Tão insubstancial quanto o medo, e tão perigoso quanto.
foreignData.name: Fera Fantasma
foreignData.text: Quando Fera Fantasma se tornar alvo de uma mágica ou habilidade, sacrifique-a.

foreignData.flavorText: Иллюзорный, как страх, и такой же опасный.
foreignData.name: Призрачный Зверь
foreignData.text: Когда Призрачный Зверь становится целью заклинания или способности, пожертвуйте его.

foreignData.name: 幽魅兽
foreignData.text: 当幽魅兽成为咒语或异能的目标时，将它牺牲。

foreignData.name: 幽魅獸
foreignData.text: 當幽魅獸成為咒語或異能的目標時，將它犧牲。

name: Phantom Beast
originalText: When Phantom Beast becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

rulings.text: If Phantom Beast becomes the target of a spell or ability, Phantom Beast’s ability triggers and goes on the stack on top of that spell or ability. Phantom Beast’s ability will resolve (causing it to be sacrificed) first. Unless the spell or ability has another target, it will then be countered when it tries to resolve for having no legal targets.

text: When Phantom Beast becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
